definition: to have no sense of shame/brazen

sentences.english: What of the old serpent who cannot shed his skin, and calls all others naked and shameless?
sentences.chinese: 對無法蛻皮而稱他人的赤裸爲不知羞恥的老蛇呢？

sentences.english: This is the result which allows us look into people's eyes rather shamelessly.
sentences.chinese: 這是由於它使我們相當不知羞恥地看到人的眼睛裏去。

sentences.english: Fielding was not ashamed to practise a little necromancy.
sentences.chinese: 菲爾丁不知羞恥地施展小巫術。

sentences.english: So many young girls these days seem to have no shame.
sentences.chinese: 現在的女孩子太不知羞恥了，很多都不穿內衣。

sentences.english: He‘s really a law-down dirty shame.
sentences.chinese: 他真是個不知羞恥的傢伙。

sentences.english: Assuming, of course, you wear undergarments. So many young girls these days seem to have no shame.
sentences.chinese: 現在的女孩子太不知羞恥了，很多都不穿內衣。
她和那些不知羞恥的女孩子們不一樣。

sentences.english: And yet we flirt shamelessly with risk.
sentences.chinese: 然而我們還是不知羞恥地調笑危險。

definition: to whisper to one another's ear
without a retreat route/caught in a dead end/having burned one's bridges
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: to walk right into the trap
lit. like a sheet of loose sand/fig. unable to cooperate (idiom)
falsetto/opposite: natural or true voice 真聲|真声[zhen1 sheng1]
no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); at a loss/in a hopeless situation
bossy and domineering/throwing one's weight about
